title: The Villainess Needs A Tyrant - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cold Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   European Ambience   Family   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Revenge   Second Chance   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Trap   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Eun Sae Ro   은새로
description:
Just now, I stole the lips of a man who is notorious as a tyrant. 

In front of my younger cousin, Arinel, who stole everything I had in my previous life.

***

“Why did you kiss me?”

“Because my younger cousin loves you, Your Majesty.”

“Is that so?”

His arms wrapped around my waist. The distance that was formed vanished in an instance. The cold-blooded, powerful man’s smile filled my view. 

“Open your lips. If you are going to do it, then do it properly.”>
